# Friendship Quiz Web Application

This is a friendship quiz web application built for Friendship Day celebrations. The application allows users to:

## Features
- Create personalized friendship quizzes with multiple-choice questions
- Share quiz codes with friends
- Take quizzes and get friendship percentage scores
- View results dashboard with statistics
- Share results on social media (WhatsApp, LinkedIn, Instagram)

## Technology Stack
- **Frontend**: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (Vanilla)
- **Storage**: LocalStorage for client-side data persistence
- **Styling**: Custom CSS with modern design patterns, gradients, and responsive layout
- **Icons**: Font Awesome icons
- **Fonts**: Google Fonts (Poppins)

## Code Structure
- `index.html` - Main HTML structure with all sections and modals
- `styles.css` - Complete styling with responsive design and animations
- `script.js` - All JavaScript functionality including quiz creation, taking, and results

## Key Functionality
- Quiz creation with up to 10 questions
- Auto-save drafts functionality
- Real-time progress tracking
- Social media sharing integration
- Dashboard with quiz statistics
- Local storage data persistence

## Development Guidelines
- Use semantic HTML5 elements
- Follow mobile-first responsive design principles
- Implement smooth animations and transitions
- Ensure accessibility with proper ARIA labels
- Use modern JavaScript ES6+ features
- Maintain clean, modular code structure
